comments.body: shall we add an assert to make sure all children have same output?

comments.body: Different children may have different `AttributeReference`s in `output` although the types are same. I checked `org.apache.spark.sql.execution.Union` and it also doesn't assert it. It should be safe since here this is a physical operator.

comments.body: Consider making this an `Array[LocalNode]`.  In general, we should probably only be using `Array` as this level of execution.
